update worshop_boundary_info
worshop_boundary_info.direction = #{Direction},
worshop_boundary_info.end_miles = #{EndMiles},
worshop_boundary_info.is_delete = #{IsDelete},
worshop_boundary_info.line_id = #{LineId},

worshop_boundary_info.track_type = #{TrackType},
worshop_boundary_info.workarea_id = #{WorkareaId}
worshop_boundary_info.update_time= current_timestamp
worshop_boundary_info.id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select worshop_boundary_info.create_time, worshop_boundary_info.direction, worshop_boundary_info.end_miles, worshop_boundary_info.id, worshop_boundary_info.is_delete, worshop_boundary_info.line_id, worshop_boundary_info.long_chain, worshop_boundary_info.operate_status, worshop_boundary_info.operator, worshop_boundary_info.remark, worshop_boundary_info.start_miles, worshop_boundary_info.status, worshop_boundary_info.track_category, worshop_boundary_info.track_type, worshop_boundary_info.update_time, worshop_boundary_info.workarea_id form worshop_boundary_info
